summary: This is an email from August 8, 2019, discussing the cell assignment and medical status of an inmate, likely Jeffrey Epstein, who was not on suicide watch or psych observation at the time. It notes he was a new admit pending bedspace in SHU and required a cellmate due to methadone detox.

events.title: Inmate Status Update
events.description: An email discusses the status of an inmate (likely Jeffrey Epstein), noting he was not on suicide watch or psych observation, was a new admit pending bedspace in SHU, and required a cellmate due to methadone detox.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 8, 2019, discussing inmate cell assignment and status.
The inmate referenced (likely Jeffrey Epstein) was not on suicide watch or psych observation at the time of the email.
The inmate was a new admit pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The inmate was on methadone detox and required a cellmate wherever he was placed.
